item.description:
I know Kelly just did Japanese, but I couldn't make that one. Sakura Garden is a new Japanese Steakhouse/hibachi/sushi place at Evergreen Walk in South Windsor. Food is quite good, rolls are excellent! The hibachi is fun. We will have our own Party room! Plenty of parking.

Please donate $1.00 to the Organizer at each Meetup to help defray the costs of running this group - Thanks!

Urban Spoon website review and info is : http://www.urbanspoon...

Hope to see you there - Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation under "Meetup" in the party room

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Sakura Garden 11/19/08 7:00pm
